ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By your Lord, We will question them all, every one of them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: By your Lord We shall question them one and all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By your Lord, We will question them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: By the Lord, We will hold them all responsible
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore, by your Lord, We shall question every one of them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, by your Lord, We shall certainly call all of them to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So, by your Lord, We would most certainly question them all,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now by thy Lord, We shall surely question them all together
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Them, by thy Lord, We shall question, every one,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: by your Lord, We shall question them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By thy Lord, We will question them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By your Lord, We will question them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore, by the Lord, We will, of a surety, call them to account,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So, by your Lord (O Muhammad SAW), We shall certainly call all of them to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: so by your Lord, We will question them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: By your Lord, we will question them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:92] By your Lord, We shall question them all — a questioning involving rebuke —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Them, by thy Lord) Muhammad; Allah here swore by Himself, (We shall question) on the Day of Judgement, (every one),
